pageContext.claim: “As part of this commitment, earlier today I signed a proclamation that defends American industry by re-imposing aluminum tariffs on Canada. Canada was taking advantage of us, as usual, and I signed it, and it imposes -- because the aluminum business was being decimated by Canada. Very unfair to our jobs and our great aluminum workers.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump talked tough but a month later swiftly reversed a policy that had drawn widespread criticism from U.S. businesses and had dented U.S.-Canada relations.
